law.history: Repealed 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 79, sec. 35, effective June 17, 1954. -- Amended 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 194, sec. 8, effective June 19, 1952. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4281b-3 and 4281b-4.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Deductions not allowed from gross income.
